org.gridgain.grid.cache
Interface GridCacheMBean

@GridMBeanDescription(value="MBean that provides access to cache descriptor.")
public interface GridCacheMBean

This interface defines JMX view on GridCache.

Wiki & Forum:

isWriteFromBehindEnabled

@GridMBeanDescription(value="True if write-from-behind is enabled for this cache.")
boolean isWriteFromBehindEnabled()
Returns True if write-from-behind is enabled.

Returns:
True if write-from-behind is enabled.

getWriteFromBehindFlushSize

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Size of internal buffer that triggers flush procedure.")
int getWriteFromBehindFlushSize()
Gets the maximum size of the write-from-behind buffer. When the count of unique keys in write buffer exceeds this value, the buffer is scheduled for write to the underlying store.

If this value is 0, then flush is performed only on time-elapsing basis. However, when this value is 0, the cache critical size is set to GridCacheConfiguration.DFLT_WRITE_FROM_BEHIND_CRITICAL_SIZE

Returns:
Buffer size that triggers flush procedure.

getWriteFromBehindFlushThreadCount

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Count of flush threads.")
int getWriteFromBehindFlushThreadCount()
Gets the number of flush threads that will perform store update operations.

Returns:
Count of worker threads.

getWriteFromBehindFlushFrequency

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Flush frequency interval in milliseconds.")
long getWriteFromBehindFlushFrequency()
Gets the cache flush frequency. All pending operations on the underlying store will be performed within time interval not less then this value.

If this value is 0, then flush is performed only when buffer size exceeds flush size.

Returns:
Flush frequency in milliseconds.

getWriteFromBehindStoreBatchSize

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Maximum size of batch for similar operations.")
int getWriteFromBehindStoreBatchSize()
Gets the maximum count of similar (put or remove) operations that can be grouped to a single batch.

Returns:
Maximum size of batch.

getWriteFromBehindTotalCriticalOverflowCount

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Count of cache overflow events since write-from-behind cache has started.")
int getWriteFromBehindTotalCriticalOverflowCount()
Gets count of write buffer overflow events since initialization. Each overflow event causes the ongoing flush operation to be performed synchronously.

Returns:
Count of cache overflow events since start.

getWriteFromBehindCriticalOverflowCount

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Count of cache overflow events since write-from-behind cache has started.")
int getWriteFromBehindCriticalOverflowCount()
Gets count of write buffer overflow events in progress at the moment. Each overflow event causes the ongoing flush operation to be performed synchronously.

Returns:
Count of cache overflow events since start.

getWriteFromBehindErrorRetryCount

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Count of cache cache entries that are currently in retry state.")
int getWriteFromBehindErrorRetryCount()
Gets count of cache entries that are in a store-retry state. An entry is assigned a store-retry state when underlying store failed due some reason and cache has enough space to retain this entry till the next try.

Returns:
Count of entries in store-retry state.

getWriteFromBehindBufferSize

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Count of cache entries that are waiting to be flushed.")
int getWriteFromBehindBufferSize()
Gets count of entries that were processed by the write-from-behind store and have not been flushed to the underlying store yet.

Returns:
Total count of entries in cache store internal buffer.
